engine.component

Interface UpdateableComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColorOscillationComponent, ComplexMovementComponent, CyclingModifierComponent, ModifierComponent, MovementComponent, MovementOscComponent, ParticleTrailComponent, SelfDestructComponent, SimpleMovementComponent, SpriteComponent

    public interface UpdateableComponent
    Specifies a component that can be updated
    Author:
    Marco

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void update(float dt, float t)
      Update according to a total elapsed time and a change in time

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(float dt,
            float t)
        Update according to a total elapsed time and a change in time
        Parameters:
        dt - The change in time since the previous frame
        t - The total elapsed time of the game
